name: Mohist
author: laravelka@yandex.ru

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Mohist Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
rm -rf /mnt/server

apk update
apk add curl

cd /mnt/server

echo -e "\nDownloading Mohist\n"

curl -sS https://mohistmc.com/api/1.19.4/latest -o $SERVER_JARFILE

curl -sS https://launcher.mojang.com/v1/objects/ed5a6bfb2b978778c3a0288fd7fab09d315b25f/server.jar -o minecraft_server.1.19.4.jar

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.
